The final (gravitational) mass of the neutron star (NS) remnant is in the range of MNS = 1.25−1.43 M⊙.

item.title: Chronicling the Reionization History at 6 ≲ z ≲ 7 with Emergent Quasar Damping Wings
item.content:encoded: <div> 高红移类星体、光谱、中性气体分数、神经网络、仿真模型 总结: 在这项研究中，研究人员使用了18个红移在6.0 < z < 7.1的类星体光谱来填补6 ≲ z ≲ 7之间的中性气体分数空白。他们运用神经网络重构类星体的连续辐射，对光谱进行规范化处理，然后将这些规范化后的光谱分为三个红移区间进行叠加。通过比较两种流体动力学模拟（ATON和CROC）中的模型，他们测量了平均中性气体分数，并同时拟合了每个叠加光谱的平均类星体寿命。他们发现中性气体分数在不同红移区间发生了变化，而平均类星体寿命约为7百万年，这与先前的研究结果相吻合。 <div> The spectra of high-redshift (z ≳ 6) quasars contain valuable information on the progression of the Epoch of Reionization. At redshifts z < 6, the observed Lyman-series forest shows that the intergalactic medium is nearly ionized, while at z > 7 the observed quasar damping wings indicate high neutral gas fractions. However, there remains a gap in neutral gas fraction constraints at 6 ≲ z ≲ 7 where the Lyman-series forest becomes saturated but damping wings have yet to fully emerge. In this work, we use a sample of 18 quasar spectra at redshifts 6.0 < z < 7.1 to close this gap. We apply neural networks to reconstruct the quasars’ continuum emission around the partially absorbed Lyα line to normalize their spectra, and stack these continuum-normalized spectra in three redshift bins. To increase the robustness of our results, we compare the stacks to a grid of models from two hydrodynamical simulations, ATON and CROC, and we measure the volume-averaged neutral gas fraction, , while jointly fitting for the mean quasar lifetime, tQ, for each stacked spectrum. We chronicle the evolution of neutral gas fraction using the ATON (CROC) models as follows: ( ) at 〈z〉 = 6.10, ( ) at 〈z〉 = 6.46, and ( ) at 〈z〉 = 6.87. At the same time, we constrain the average quasar lifetime to be tQ ≲ 7 Myr across all redshift bins, in good agreement with previous studies.

item.title: Neutrino Fluxes from Different Classes of Galactic Sources
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 中微子通量, 星系源, IceCube, KM3NeT, 南半球 总结: 本研究估计了不同类型星系源的中微子通量，并将其与IceCube最近探测到的弥散中微子通量进行了比较。研究发现，这些源产生的通量可能为IceCube中微子通量的约20%。大多数所选择的源都位于南半球，因此像KM3NeT这样的探测器可能有助于解析观测到的星系弥散中微子通量中的源。

We estimate the neutrino flux from different kinds of galactic sources and compare it with the recent diffuse neutrino flux detected by IceCube. We find that the flux from these sources may contribute to ∼20% of the IceCube neutrino flux. Most of the sources selected in this work populate the southern hemisphere, therefore a detector like KM3NeT could help in resolving the sources out of the observed diffused galactic neutrino flux.

item.title: The Population Synthesis of Wolf–Rayet Stars Involving Binary Merger Channels
item.content:encoded:
Wolf-Rayet stars, massive stars, binary merger, formation channels, population synthesis

总结: Wolf-Rayet（W-R）星是非常重要的大质量恒星。通过模拟，我们发现双星合并是W-R恒星形成的重要途径，能够解释观测到的W-R恒星总体比例。我们的模型大致能够复现银河系W-R恒星的观测分布，但对大麦哲伦星云的观测分布解释不足。进行解释时，我们考虑了在双星合并过程中可能低估了质量损失率。
Wolf–Rayet (W-R) stars are very important massive stars. However, their origin and the observed binary fraction within the entire W-R population are still debated. We investigate some possible merger channels for the formation of W-R stars, including main sequence (MS)/Hertzsprung gap (HG) + MS, He + HG/giant branch (GB). We find that many products produced via binary merger can evolve into W-R stars, the MS/HG + MS merger channel can explain W-R stars with luminosities higher than ∼105.4L⊙, while the He + HG/GB merger channel can explain low-luminosity W-R stars in the range of 104.7L⊙ ∼ 105.5L⊙. In the population synthesis analysis of W-R stars, we assume an initial binary fraction (fini,bin) of 50% and 100% for massive stars. We also assume that MS/HG + MS merger products are nonrotating or rapidly rotating (ω/ωcrit = 0.8). In different cases, the calculated single fractions of W-R stars range from 22.2%–60.6% in the Milky Way (MW) and from 8.3%–70.9% in the Large Magellanic Cloud (LMC). The current observations fall within the range of our calculations. When the merger product of MS/HG + MS rotates rapidly, we estimate that there are approximately 1015–1396 W-R stars in the MW and 128–204 W-R stars in the LMC. Our model also roughly reproduces the observed single-peak luminosity distribution of W-R stars in the MW. However, the weak bimodal luminosity distribution observed in the LMC is not reproduced in our model. We assess that this may be due to the model underestimating the mass-loss rate in the LMC. In conclusion, we consider that the binary merger is a significant formation channel for W-R formation, and can explain the observed high fraction of the single W-R stars in the total population.

item.title: Formation of Giant Planets by Gas Disk Gravitational Instability on Wide Orbits around Protostars with Varied Masses. II. Quadrupled Spatial Resolution and Beta Cooling
item.content:encoded:
关键词: exoplanet demographics, planet formation, gas disk gravitational instability (GDGI), protostars, eccentric orbits 总结:

这篇文章讨论了外行星的形成理论，指出核心和鹅卵石聚集对岩石和冰行星的形成有影响，但还需要考虑气盘引力不稳定对M-矮星巨行星和远距离行星的影响。新模型提高了空间分辨率和采用了β冷却逼近，发现GDGI可以解释在离心轨道上（离心率小于0.2）形成距离约30到50天文单位的巨行星。随着原恒星质量减少至0.1太阳质量，形成的数量降至0。
Exoplanet demographics are sufficiently advanced to provide important constraints on theories of planet formation. While core and pebble accretion are preferred for rocky and icy planets, there appears to be a need for gas disk gravitational instability (GDGI) to play a role in the formation of M-dwarf gas giants and those orbiting at large distances. Here we present GDGI models that go beyond those presented by Boss (2011) dealing with the formation of wide-orbit gas giants. The new models use quadrupled spatial resolution, in both the radial and azimuthal directions, to reduce the effects of finite spatial resolution. The new models also employ the β cooling approximation, instead of the diffusion approximation used by Boss (2011), in order to push the models further in time. As in Boss (2011), the central protostars have masses of 0.1, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, or 2.0 M⊙, surrounded by disks with masses ranging from 0.019 M⊙ to 0.21 M⊙. For each case, two models are computed, one with an initial minimum Toomre Q stability value ranging from 1.1 to 1.7, and one with a higher initial disk temperature, resulting in the initial minimum Q ranging from 2.2 to 3.4. These new models continue to show that GDGI can explain the formation of gas giants at distances of ∼30 to ∼50 au on eccentric orbits (e less than ∼0.2), though the number formed drops to 0 as the protostar mass decreases to 0.1 M⊙.

item.title: The Effects of Including Farside Observations on In Situ Predictions of Heliospheric Models
item.content:encoded:
关键词: heliospheric models, farside observations, He ii 304 Å emission, STEREO, in situ measurements 总结: 本文讨论了太阳圈模型面临的重要挑战，即缺乏对太阳全面观测的数据。文章提出了利用STEREO观测到的He ii 304 Å发射来获得太阳背面磁通量的新技术。研究通过比较模型预测的原位测量值与实际测量值发现，尽管存在一些数量上的差异，但这些差异远远小于太阳圈模型与实际观测数据之间的总体差异。然而，结果表明，那些显著改变开放通量与闭合通量以及总通量比值的活跃区域将对预测的原位测量结果产生最大的影响。

A significant challenge facing heliospheric models is the lack of full Sun observational coverage. The lack of information about the farside photospheric magnetic field necessitates the use of various techniques to approximate the structure and appearance of this field. However, a recently developed technique that uses He ii 304 Å emission observed by the Solar Terrestrial Relations Observatory (STEREO) enables developing a magnetic flux proxy by imaging of active regions on the far side of the Sun. Incorporating information about these active regions on the far side of the Sun may have the potential to drastically improve heliospheric models. In this work, we run multiple heliospheric models with and without farside information obtained from STEREO observations of He ii 304 Å emission and compare the predicted in situ measurements from the models with real in situ data from STEREO and Earth. We find that although there are noticeable quantitative differences between the in situ predictions from the two models, they are dwarfed by the overall disagreement between the heliospheric model and the actual in situ data. Nevertheless, our results indicate that active regions that significantly change the ratio of open-to-closed and open-to-total flux create the biggest change in the predicted in situ measurements.

item.title: An Atypical Low-frequency Quasiperiodic Oscillation Detected in the Hard State of MAXI J1348–630 with Insight-HXMT
item.content:encoded:
黑洞X射线双星，Insight-HXMT，LFQPO，MAXI J1348−630，频率
该研究利用Insight-HXMT的档案数据，在黑洞X射线双星MAXI J1348−630中探测到一个新的非典型低频准周期振荡（LFQPO）。这个LFQPO在Insight-HXMT的三个仪器中都被检测到，结合显著性达到了3σ–5σ，覆盖了1–100 keV的宽能量范围。其分数rms似乎随能量减少。它只出现在硬态期间的主要和小暴发期间，X射线强度范围变化了10倍，硬度范围非常窄。这种新类型LFQPO的频率相当稳定，介于0.08–0.15赫兹之间。研究讨论了LFQPO的不同模型，发现没有一个可以解释这种新类型LFQPO的观测属性。

总结: 该研究利用Insight-HXMT的数据在黑洞X射线双星MAXI J1348−630中发现了一种新的非典型低频准周期振荡（LFQPO）。这种LFQPO在宽能量范围内被观测到，只出现在特定的硬态期间。它的频率相当稳定，但现有的模型都无法解释这种新型LFQPO的观测特性。
Based on the Insight-HXMT archival data, we have detected a new atypical low-frequency quasiperiodic oscillation (LFQPO) in the black hole X-ray binary MAXI J1348−630. The new LFQPO is detected in all three instruments of Insight-HXMT with a combined significance of 3σ–5σ, covering a wide energy range of 1–100 keV. The fractional rms seems to decrease with energy. It exclusively appears in the hard state during both the main and mini outburst, spanning an X-ray intensity range by a factor of 10, and a very narrow hardness range. The frequency of this new type of LFQPO is moderately stable, in the range of 0.08–0.15 Hz. We discussed different models for the LFQPO, and found none can explain the observed properties of this new type of LFQPO.

item.title: Updating the First CHIME/FRB Catalog of Fast Radio Bursts with Baseband Data
item.content:encoded:
CHIME/FRB Collaboration, fast radio bursts (FRBs), CHIME, baseband data, polarization information

总结: 2021年，加拿大氢强度映射实验（CHIME）无线电望远镜探测到536个快速无线电爆发（FRBs），并发布了一份目录。文章介绍了对其中140个FRBs的结果更新，其中包括了基带数据的分析和波形研究。可以通过望远镜的天线测量电压来最大化望远镜对主波束内任何方向的灵敏度，称为“波束成形”。通过这种方法，可以提高信噪比，将FRBs定位到次角分辨率，并校正仪器的波束响应。此外，本次更新还提供了极化信息以及数据集的基带数据。这些数据增加了对FRB极化特性的研究。
In 2021, a catalog of 536 fast radio bursts (FRBs) detected with the Canadian Hydrogen Intensity Mapping Experiment (CHIME) radio telescope was released by the CHIME/FRB Collaboration. This large collection of bursts, observed with a single instrument and uniform selection effects, has advanced our understanding of the FRB population. Here we update the results for 140 of these FRBs for which channelized raw voltage (“baseband”) data are available. With the voltages measured by the telescope’s antennas, it is possible to maximize the telescope sensitivity in any direction within the primary beam, an operation called “beamforming.” This allows us to increase the signal-to-noise ratios of the bursts and to localize them to subarcminute precision. The improved localizations are also used to correct the beam response of the instrument and to measure fluxes and fluences with an ∼10% uncertainty. Additionally, the time resolution is increased by 3 orders of magnitude relative to that in the first CHIME/FRB catalog, and, applying coherent dedispersion, burst morphologies can be studied in detail. Polarization information is also available for the full sample of 140 FRBs, providing an unprecedented data set to study the polarization properties of the population. We release the baseband data beamformed to the most probable position of each FRB. These data are analyzed in detail in a series of accompanying papers.

item.title: Studying Magnetic Reconnection with Synchrotron Polarization Statistics
item.content:encoded:
关键词：磁重连接，磁能释放，磁扰动，辐射同步辐射极化统计，数值模拟
总结:
这篇文章研究了磁扰动对磁重连接过程的影响。通过观察辐射同步辐射极化统计的方式，研究了在不同方向上的视线如何影响磁层的性质。研究发现极化密度统计可以揭示磁重连接扰动的谱特性，从而为理解磁重连接过程开辟了新的途径。
Magnetic reconnection is a fundamental process for releasing magnetic energy in space physics and astrophysics. At present, the usual way to investigate the reconnection process is through analytical studies or first-principle numerical simulations. This paper is the first to understand the turbulent magnetic reconnection process by exploring the nature of magnetic turbulence. From the perspective of radio synchrotron polarization statistics, we study how to recover the properties of the turbulent magnetic field by considering the line of sight along different directions of the reconnection layer. We find that polarization intensity statistics can reveal the spectral properties of reconnection turbulence. This work opens up a new way of understanding turbulent magnetic reconnection.

item.title: MACE: A Machine-learning Approach to Chemistry Emulation
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 化学动力学, 3D模拟, 机器学习, AGB喷流, PyTorch 总结:

这篇文章讨论了天体物理环境的化学特性和动力学之间的密切关系，强调了对这些环境进行3D建模的必要性。然而，在3D流体动力学模拟中解决化学动力学是计算上不可行的。作者提出了一种名为mace的机器学习方法来模拟动态环境中的化学反应，通过使用自动编码器和一组潜在的常微分方程来降低化学网络的维度并对其进行时间演化。通过在PyTorch中高效实现，mace的性能优于传统方法约26倍，并且在计算上具有次线性的可扩展性。这种方法对于包括AGB喷流在内的天体物理环境的3D化学动力学模拟具有重要的应用潜力。
The chemistry of an astrophysical environment is closely coupled to its dynamics, the latter often found to be complex. Hence, to properly model these environments a 3D context is necessary. However, solving chemical kinetics within a 3D hydro simulation is computationally infeasible for even a modest parameter study. In order to develop a feasible 3D hydro-chemical simulation, the classical chemical approach needs to be replaced by a faster alternative. We present mace, a Machine-learning Approach to Chemistry Emulation, as a proof-of-concept work on emulating chemistry in a dynamical environment. Using the context of AGB outflows, we have developed an architecture that combines the use of an autoencoder (to reduce the dimensionality of the chemical network) and a set of latent ordinary differential equations (that are solved to perform the temporal evolution of the reduced features). Training this architecture with an integrated scheme makes it possible to successfully reproduce a full chemical pathway in a dynamical environment. mace outperforms its classical analog on average by a factor of 26. Furthermore, its efficient implementation in PyTorch results in a sublinear scaling with respect to the number of hydrodynamical simulation particles.

item.title: SOFIA/HAWC+ Far-infrared Polarimetric Large-area CMZ Exploration Survey. III. Full Survey Data Set
item.content:encoded:
FIREPLACE survey, DR2, polarization pseudovectors, magnetic field orientations, CMZ

FIREPLACE调查的第二个数据发布（DR2）覆盖了中分子区域（CMZ）的热极化尘埃发射观测结果，发现磁场取向呈双峰分布，并观察到磁场取向与分子云的总强度形态有关。受恒星风和潮汐力的影响，磁场结构呈现出明显的空间变化。总结：
该调查利用高分辨率机载宽带相机在214微米波段观测了CMZ区域的热极化尘埃发射。通过对DR2和DR1数据进行处理，获得了约64,000个极化伪矢量，发现磁场取向呈双峰分布，且与其他研究结果相似。同时观察到磁场取向与分子云的总强度形态有关，且受到恒星风和潮汐力的影响。
We present the second data release (DR2) of the Far-InfraREd Polarimetric Large-Area CMZ Exploration (FIREPLACE) survey. This survey utilized the Stratospheric Observatory for Infrared Astronomy High-resolution Airborne Wideband Camera plus instrument at 214 μm (E band) at a resolution of 19.″6 to observe thermal polarized dust emission throughout the Central Molecular Zone (CMZ). DR2 consists of observations obtained in 2022 covering the region of the CMZ extending from the Brick to the Sgr C molecular clouds (corresponding to a 1° × 0.°75 region of the sky). We combine DR2 with the first FIREPLACE data release (DR1) to obtain full coverage of the CMZ (a 1.°5 × 0.°75 region of the sky). After applying total and polarized intensity significance cuts on the full FIREPLACE data set, we obtain ∼64,000 Nyquist-sampled polarization pseudovectors. The distribution of polarization pseudovectors confirms a bimodal distribution in the CMZ magnetic field orientations, recovering field components that are oriented predominantly parallel or perpendicular to the Galactic plane. This distribution of orientations is similar to what was observed in DR1 and other studies. We also inspect the magnetic fields toward a set of prominent CMZ molecular clouds (the Brick, Three Little Pigs, 50 and 20 km s−1 clouds, circumnuclear disk, CO 0.02-0.02, and Sgr C), revealing spatially varying magnetic fields having orientations that generally trace the total intensity morphologies of the clouds. We find evidence that compression from stellar winds and shear from tidal forces are prominent mechanisms influencing the structure of the magnetic fields.

item.title: Photons from Neutrinos: The Gamma-Ray Echo of a Supernova Neutrino Burst
item.content:encoded:
星体, 核心坍缩, 中微子, 伽马射线, 探测器 在星体的核心坍缩过程中，释放出大量的能量，产生持续约10秒钟的各种中微子的爆发。恒星的氢包层中发生的逆贝塔衰变会产生电磁级联，最终在0.511 MeV的特征能量处引发伽马射线的闪耀，成为中微子爆发的“回音”。它的光度曲线具有快速上升、同样快速的下降，以及之间持续约一分钟或一小时的平台。对于近地球的恒星（距离D≲1 kpc），回音将可以在未来的伽马射线望远镜上观测到，只要其有效面积达到103 cm2或更大。其观测将为我们提供关于包层大小和成分的信息。与直接探测到的中微子爆发结合起来，还可以提供有关离开视线的中微子发射的信息，并进行恒星表面至地球之间中微子传播效应的检测。

总结:本研究分析了恒星核心坍缩产生的中微子爆发引发的伽马射线闪耀现象。通过观测这一现象，可以获取有关恒星包层大小和成分的信息，并对中微子在恒星表面至地球之间的传播效应进行测试。
When a star undergoes core collapse, a vast amount of energy is released in a ∼10 s long burst of neutrinos of all species. Inverse beta decay in the star’s hydrogen envelope causes an electromagnetic cascade that ultimately results in a flare of gamma rays—an “echo” of the neutrino burst—at the characteristic energy of 0.511 MeV. We study the phenomenology and detectability of this flare. Its luminosity curve is characterized by a fast, seconds-long rise and an equally fast decline, with a minute- or hour-long plateau in between. For a near-Earth star (distance D ≲ 1 kpc) the echo will be observable at near future gamma-ray telescopes with an effective area of 103 cm2 or larger. Its observation will inform us on the envelope size and composition. In conjunction with the direct detection of the neutrino burst, it will also give information on the neutrino emission away from the line of sight and will enable tests of neutrino propagation effects between the stellar surface and Earth.

item.title: Erratum: “Hubble Space Telescope Snapshot Survey for Resolved Companions of Galactic Cepheids: Final Results” (2020, ApJ, 905, 81)
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 科技 电动汽车 电池技术 碳中和 可再生能源 文章总结: 科技发展推动了电动汽车的进步和普及，电动汽车市场迅速增长。然而，电池技术的发展仍然是电动汽车发展的瓶颈之一。碳中和成为了未来电动汽车发展的重要方向，许多汽车制造商已经承诺在2030年之前实现碳中和。可再生能源的应用也逐渐成为电动汽车发展的重要动力源。总结:

科技的发展促进了电动汽车市场的快速增长，但电池技术仍然是一个瓶颈。碳中和和可再生能源成为了电动汽车未来发展的重要方向。

item.title: Chemistry in Externally FUV-irradiated Disks in the Outskirts of the Orion Nebula Cluster
item.content:encoded:
ALMA Band 6 observations, Class II protoplanetary disks, external far-ultraviolet radiation, chemical composition, Orion Nebula Cluster 总结:

这篇文章研究了在奥利安星云星团边缘的两个受辐射的Class II原行星盘的化学成分。研究发现，受辐射的盘与孤立的盘没有显著差异，这表明它们距离大型Trapezium恒星足够远，使得其化学成分不再受到外部FUV辐射的影响。研究还指出，这些发现更可能与不同恒星质量相关，而非外部辐射场。为了进一步阐明外部辐射对不同类型盘中行星形成化学的影响，需要对质量较低的盘和靠近大型Trapezium恒星的盘进行更多观测。
Most stars are born in stellar clusters, and their protoplanetary disks, which are the birthplaces of planets, can, therefore, be affected by the radiation of nearby massive stars. However, little is known about the chemistry of externally irradiated disks, including whether or not their properties are similar to the so-far better-studied isolated disks. Motivated by this question, we present ALMA Band 6 observations of two irradiated Class II protoplanetary disks in the outskirts of the Orion Nebula Cluster to explore the chemical composition of disks exposed to (external) far-ultraviolet (FUV) radiation fields: the 216-0939 disk and the binary system 253-1536A/B, which are exposed to radiation fields of 102–103 times the average interstellar radiation field. We detect lines from CO isotopologues, HCN, H2CO, and C2H toward both protoplanetary disks. Based on the observed disk-integrated line fluxes and flux ratios, we do not find significant differences between isolated and irradiated disks. The observed differences seem to be more closely related to the different stellar masses than to the external radiation field. This suggests that these disks are far enough away from the massive Trapezium stars, that their chemistry is no longer affected by external FUV radiation. Additional observations toward lower-mass disks and disks closer to the massive Trapezium stars are required to elucidate the level of external radiation required to make an impact on the chemistry of planet formation in different kinds of disks.

item.title: Solar Eruptive Phenomena Associated with Solar Energetic Electron Spectral Types
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 太阳耀斑，日冕物质抛射，能谱形状，太阳高能电子，加速过程 总结: 本研究就太阳高能电子谱的六种类型进行了探讨，并发现它们与太阳喷发现象的关联。具体来说，单幅功率谱(SPL)类型与硬X射线耀斑和西半球冠质物质抛射(CME)的关联较强，而上升双幂律(UDPL)类型与II型射电爆发和日冕物质抛射的关联显著，且速度更快。对于DDPL和ER类型，以及LP和DDPL类型，分别与II型射电爆发和全圆日冕物质抛射的关联较弱。此外，DDPL类型谱指数与关联CME速度呈正相关，而与耀斑强度呈负相关，而DDPL类型则相反。这些结果表明SPL类型可能是高处太阳日冕内的初始加速过程的结果，并为后续加速过程提供种子群体，形成了其他五种类型的高能电子谱。

The energy spectral shape of solar energetic electron events carries important information on the energetic electron source/acceleration at the Sun. We investigate the association of six newly identified solar energetic electron spectral types with solar eruptive phenomena, including the downward double-power-law (DDPL) spectrum with break energy EB above 20 keV (DDPL ), DDPL with EB below 20 keV (DDPL ), upward double-power law (UDPL), single-power-law (SPL), Ellision–Ramaty–like (ER), and logarithmic-parabola (LP). We find that the SPL type shows (the other five types show) an association with hard X-ray flares of ∼38% (∼55%–82%) and an association with west-limb coronal mass ejections (CMEs) of ∼76% (∼85%–93%). Among the other five types, the DDPL and ER (LP and DDPL ) types only have an association with type II radio bursts of ∼7%–8% (∼16%–20%) and an association with halo CMEs of ∼5%–9% (∼11%–21%); however, the UDPL type exhibits a significant (∼47% and ∼50%) association with type II bursts and halo CMEs, with a significantly faster median CME speed of km s−1. For DDPL (DDPL ) with a positive (no) correlation between spectral indexes and no (a positive) correlation between the spectral index and break energy, the spectrum appears to be flatter as the associated CME (flare) becomes faster (stronger). These results suggest that the SPL type can result from the initial acceleration process that likely occurs high in the corona, and then provide seed populations for further acceleration processes to form the other five types: the DDPL and ER types via flare-related processes, the LP and DDPL types via CME-related processes, and the UDPL type via CME-driven shocks.

item.title: MIDIS: The Relation between Strong (Hβ + [O iii]) Emission, Star Formation, and Burstiness around the Epoch of Reionization
item.content:encoded:
星系; 星系质量; 特定星形成率; 星形成率; 金属丰度 在这项研究中，通过使用JWST/NIRCam成像技术，我们对星系在“再电离纪”之前和之后的性质进行了调查，我们发现了(Hβ + [O iii])强发射体的一些重要性质，它们显示出在红移z = 5.5–7时的显著特征。在星系比星的质量和年龄之间存在着一定的关联性，并且与特定的星形成率(sSFR)呈正相关。在星形成率-星系质量平面上，这些发射体分布在主序列和星暴区，这在低星系质量时变得模糊。此外我们还发现星系的Hβ + [O iii]发射等当于具有高的特定的星形成率。因此，在研究星系的宇宙星系形成活动时，考虑到发射体和非发射体的星系是非常重要的。

总结: 星系的性质在再电离纪前后有显著变化，这与星系质量和特定的星形成率相关，Hβ + [O iii]和特定的星形成率相关，发射体和非发射体的星系性质相似，需要整体考虑星系形成活动。
We investigate the properties of strong (Hβ + [O iii]) emitters before and after the end of the “Epoch of Reionization” from z = 8 to z = 5.5. We make use of ultradeep JWST/NIRCam imaging in the parallel field (P2) of the MIRI Deep Imaging Survey (MIDIS) in the Hubble eXtreme Deep Field (H-XDF), in order to select prominent (Hβ + [O iii]) emitters (with rest-frame equivalent width (EW0) ≳ 100 Å) at z = 5.5–7, based on their flux density enhancement in the F356W band with respect to the spectral energy distribution continuum. We complement our selection with other (Hβ + [O iii]) emitters from the literature at similar and higher (z = 7−8) redshifts. We find (nonindependent) anticorrelations between EW0(Hβ + [O iii]) and both galaxy stellar mass and age, in agreement with previous studies, and a positive correlation with specific star formation rate (sSFR). On the SFR–M⋆ plane, the (Hβ + [O iii]) emitters populate both the star formation main sequence and the starburst region, which become indistinguishable at low stellar masses ( ). We find tentative evidence for a nonmonotonic relation between EW0(Hβ + [O iii]) and SFR, such that both parameters correlate with each other at SFR ≳ 1 M⊙ yr−1, while the correlation flattens out at lower SFRs. This suggests that low metallicities producing high EW0(Hβ + [O iii]) could be important at low SFR values. Interestingly, the properties of the strong emitters and other galaxies (33% and 67% of our z = 5.5–7 sample, respectively) are similar, including, in many cases, high sSFR. Therefore, it is crucial to consider both emitters and nonemitters to obtain a complete picture of the cosmic star formation activity around the Epoch of Reionization.

item.title: Volatile Mass Partitioned among the Atmosphere, Mantle, and Core in Proto-Mars
item.content:encoded:
分布、挥发物质、火星、形成、地幔 火星的形成过程中，挥发性物质如水、氢和碳在大气层、地幔和地核中的分布情况进行了分析。这种挥发性物质的分配对于影响内在磁场的产生、地幔对流和岩浆活动至关重要。研究表明，形成过程导致了火星地幔和地核中存在水和轻元素。研究采用了一种混合型原大气模型，考虑了上层由星云成分构成，下层由简化构建模块的撞击脱气成分构成。数值分析暗示，在火星大约达到现在一半大小后，形成这种高温高压的岩浆海会引发水蒸气、碳和氢从原始大气层迁移到行星内部。最终，大约数百亿吨的水可能已经分布到地幔中，并且如果再次通过撞击脱气形成塔尔西斯高原的洪水玄武岩，可能已经补给了火星古代的海洋。与此同时，数百亿吨的碳和数百亿吨的氢（相当于数百亿吨的H2O）发现分布在地核中。尽管硫的分布被简化为所有的硫都在地核中，但硫占地核质量的14%到19%的结果与“洞察”号所建议的地核密度一致。

总结: 火星形成过程中，水、碳和氢等挥发性物质从原始大气层迁移到内部，供给了火星古代海洋的水，分布在地幔和地核中。同时，硫主要分布在地核中。
We analyze the distribution of volatiles such as water, hydrogen, and carbon within the atmosphere, mantle, and core of Mars during its accretion stages. The partitioning of these volatiles is crucial as it influences the generation of intrinsic magnetic fields, mantle convection, and magmatic activity. The study suggests that the accretion process is responsible for the presence of water and light elements within the Martian mantle and core. We employ a hybrid-type proto-atmosphere model, which considers an upper layer composed of nebula components and a lower layer made up of degassed components from the impact degassing of the simplified building blocks based on the two-component model. Our numerical analysis implies that the formation of a magma ocean at this high temperature and pressure after around the half-size of the present Mars triggers the migration of water vapor, carbon, and hydrogen from the primordial atmosphere into the planetary interior. Ultimately, several 1021 kg of water could have been distributed to the mantle and, if degassed again by the formation of flood basalts on the Tharsis Plateau, could have supplied Mars’ ancient oceans. Meanwhile, several 1020 kg of carbon and 1019 kg of hydrogen (equivalent to 1020 kg H2O) were found to be distributed in the core. Although the distribution of sulfur was simplified so that all of the sulfur is in the core, a result of sulfur accounting for 14 wt% to 19 wt.% of the core mass would be consistent with the core density suggested by InSight.

item.title: Discovery of a 100 kpc Narrow Curved Twin Jet in the S-shaped Giant Radio Galaxy J0644+1043
item.content:encoded:
radio galaxy, S-shaped morphology, uGMRT map, black hole, jet precession

这篇文章报告了用30 μJy beam−1敏感度的525 MHz宽带(uGMRT图)发现的J0644+1043无线电星系的S形态结构。通过2米罗兹恒星望远镜对宿主星系的专门光谱观测得到了红移为0.0488，给出了异常无线电结构的投影线性尺度超过0.7 Mpc。这个巨型无线电星系由质量为M⊙的黑洞驱动，从其附近发出良好准直和有节状的射流，每个射流长约100 kpc。整个无线电结构可能是由于有效的射流进动而形成，年龄不到50百万年，1.4 GHz功率约为6×1024 W Hz−1，并且观察到的形态特征并不严格符合传统的Fanaroff–Riley (FR) FR I或FR II类别。
总结: 本文报道了J0644+1043无线电星系的S形态结构发现、红移测量结果和相关特征，包括射流长度和功率等信息。研究指出这种巨型无线电星系可能是由于有效的射流进动造成的，其特征不符合传统的FR I或FR II分类。
We report the discovery of an S-shaped morphology of the radio galaxy J0644+1043 imaged with a 30 μJy beam−1 sensitive 525 MHz broadband (bands 3 + 4) uGMRT map. Dedicated spectroscopic observations of the host galaxy carried out with the 2 m Rozhen telescope yielded a redshift of 0.0488, giving a projected linear size of the peculiar radio structure of over 0.7 Mpc. This giant radio galaxy is powered by a black hole of mass M⊙, from the vicinity of which emanate well-collimated and knotty jets, each ∼100 kpc long. The entire radio structure, presumably due to the effective jet precession, is less than 50 Myr old, has a power of ∼6 × 1024 W Hz−1 at 1.4 GHz, and has observed morphological characteristics that do not strictly conform to the traditional Fanaroff–Riley (FR) FR I or FR II categories.

item.title: Reverse Shock Revisited in Cassiopeia A with Chandra
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Chandra X-ray Observatory, 反冲冲击, 超新星遗迹, 辐射谱学, 速度测量
总结: 通过查看超新星遗迹Cassiopeia A的数据，利用Chandra X射线天文台的数据，研究了其中的反冲冲击现象。从S/Si Kα线流量比和Fe Kα线重心能量的径向分布图中可以看出，它们都呈单调增加的趋势，确认了Si和Fe丰富的喷射物质被反冲冲击加热。在Cassiopeia A中，S和Si线流量比的突然变化明显可见，从而确定了反冲冲击的位置，在观测者框架内，北西方向约为3950±210 km/s，南东方向约为2900±260 km/s。同时，喷射物质的框架内速度为北西方约为1150 km/s，南东方约为1300 km/s。通过测量得到的反冲冲击速度与X射线和/或光学图像获得的速度非常一致。这表明爆发星的非对称爆炸对反冲冲击和喷射物质的相互作用起着关键作用，最终塑造了超新星遗迹中观察到的复杂特征。

Using data from the Chandra X-ray Observatory, we revisit the reverse shock in the supernova remnant (SNR) Cassiopeia A. Based on spectroscopy of a series of annuli in the northwest (NW) and southeast (SE), we get the radial profiles of the S/Si Kα line flux ratio and Fe Kα line centroid energy. They both show monotonic increase, confirming that the Si- and Fe-rich ejecta are heated by the reverse shock. The abrupt change of the S and Si line flux ratio is clearly observed in Cassiopeia A, leading to the determination of the reverse-shock location (∼1.′71 0.′16 and ∼1.′35 0.′18 in the NW and SE, with respect to the central source). By comparing the radial profiles of the S and Si line flux, we find that the reverse shock is moving outward in the frame of the observer, and the velocities are ∼3950 ± 210 km s−1 and ∼2900 ± 260 km s−1 in the NW and SE, respectively. In contrast, the velocities become ∼1150 km s−1 (NW) and ∼1300 km s−1 (SE) in the ejecta frame. Our measured reverse-shock velocities are quite consistent with those obtained from the X-ray and/or optical images. They therefore supply a cross-check of the accuracy for the two available methods for measuring the reverse-shock velocity in SNRs. Both the location and the velocity of the reverse shock show apparent asymmetry, suggesting that the asymmetric explosion of the progenitor plays a key role in the interaction between the reverse shock and the ejecta, ultimately shaping the complex features observed in SNRs.

item.title: Periodically Modulated Magnetic Reconnection
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: reconnection, electron-scale, periodic modulation, magnetic trapping, energy dissipation
总结: 本研究利用磁层多尺度探测器的高频数据首次证实了在电子尺度上存在周期调制的重连现象。这种周期调制被认为是由X线施加的有限磁场阱所导致的，这产生了离散的、色散的电子条纹。这些色散的条纹很好地由一个磁场阱损失转换模型所重现，它们周期性地打破了冻结条件并驱动能量耗散。这种电子转换效应消除了自由电子，增强了电子混合，并产生了高度结构化的三维分布，这产生了强烈的无线电辐射。这些启示性的结果表明，重连过程具有固有的由三维电子物理学确定的周期性，为理解空间和天体等离子体中重连驱动的能量传输提供了关键的见解。 <div> We present the first evidence for periodically modulated reconnection at the electron scale in space, using unparalleled, high-cadence data from Magnetospheric Multiscale spacecraft. The periodic modulation is attributed to finite magnetic trapping imposed by the X-line, which generates discrete, dispersive electron stripes. The dispersive stripes, well reproduced by a trapping-loss transition model, periodically break the frozen-in condition and drive energy dissipation. Such an electron transition effect eliminates free electrons, enhances electron mixing, and causes highly structured, three-dimensional distributions that generate intense radio emissions. These illuminating results, suggesting that reconnection hosts inherent periodicity determined by three-dimensional electron physics, provide crucial insights into understanding reconnection-driven energy transport in space and astrophysical plasmas.

item.title: A Possibly Short GRB 180418A and Phenomenology of Reverse-Shock Emission in the Optical Afterglows of Gamma-Ray Bursts
item.content:encoded:
GRB 180418A, optical follow-up observations, afterglow, shock models, physical properties
GRB 180418A的光学后续观测显示其光余辉采用了前向冲击（FS）和反向冲击（RS）模型。光曲线拟合显示RS区域具有中等程度的磁化。该爆发的持续时间T90处于短时和长时伽马射线暴（GRB）之间的中间地带。同时，通过计算参数值发现该爆发可能属于SGRB类别。同时对比了其他SGRB和LGRB的性质发现它们有着相似性，因此推测GRB 180418A可能属于SGRB类别。

总结:
GRB 180418A的光学后续观测显示其光余辉采用了前向冲击（FS）和反向冲击（RS）模型。光曲线拟合显示RS区域具有中等程度的磁化。该爆发的持续时间T90处于短时和长时伽马射线暴（GRB）之间的中间地带。同时，通过计算参数值发现该爆发可能属于SGRB类别。同时对比了其他SGRB和LGRB的性质发现它们有着相似性，因此推测GRB 180418A可能属于SGRB类别。
We present early-time ground-based optical follow-up observations of GRB 180418A, which was discovered by both Swift/BAT and Fermi/GBM. Its broadband afterglow was well monitored by Swift/XRT and ground-based optical telescopes. The optical light curve of GRB 180418A can be modeled by forward shock (FS) plus reverse shock (RS). We fit the light curves with standard external shock models and derive the physical properties of the outflow. It is found that the ratio RB ≡ εB,r/εB,f is 11.22, indicating a moderate degree of magnetization in the RS region. The reported duration of GRB 180418A, T90, lies in the intermediate region between short and long gamma-ray bursts (GRBs). We further discuss the classification of GRB 180418A, and calculate ε = Eγ,iso,52/Ep,z,2 values of 0.026 and 0.018 (assuming the redshift z is 1.0 and 1.5, respectively), which is closer to short GRBs (SGRBs) in the ε-T90,z plane. If GRB 180418A is an SGRB, it is the only reported SGRB thus far with RS emission in optical light curves. In order to compare the properties of GRB 180418A, we collected three SGRBs that may have RS emission (GRBs 060313, 090426, and 210207B) and also 22 long GRBs (LGRBs) with RS emission. We find that the parameters of LGRBs are in a wider range than those of SGRBs. Also, SGRBs appear to have very small RB values, but the results are generally similar to those of LGRBs. The fitting parameters of GRB 180418A are generally consistent with those of the other three SGRBs, implying that GRB 180418A may belong to the category of SGRBs.

item.title: The Dynamic Response of Jovian Magnetotail Reconnection to Enhanced Solar Wind Ram Pressure
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Grid Agnostic Magnetohydrodynamic (MHD), Jupiter's magnetosphere, reconnection, solar wind, simulations 总结:
本研究使用了Grid Agnostic Magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) for Extended Research Applications (GAMERA)模型对木星磁尾重新连接进行了模拟。研究结果表明，木星磁尾重新连接主要发生在午夜和午夜后区域，并受太阳风影响。太阳风增压会压缩木星磁层，减少重新连接的发生。研究验证了GAMERA模型在模拟木星磁层中的适用性，为我们提供了对木星磁层动态结构和太阳风响应的新见解。
In this study, we employ the Grid Agnostic Magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) for Extended Research Applications (GAMERA), a high-resolving-power, three-dimensional global MHD model, to simulate magnetotail reconnection in Jupiter's magnetosphere. While previous satellite observations have provided initial statistics on magnetotail reconnection properties at Jupiter, they have been limited in spacetime coverage, leaving the dynamic process of Jovian magnetotail reconnection and its response to the solar wind (SW) poorly understood. Using MHD simulations, we quantitatively analyze the temporal evolution and spatial dependence of nightside reconnection in Jupiter's magnetotail under ideal quiet and enhanced SW conditions. Our results demonstrate that magnetotail reconnection tends to occur in the midnight and postmidnight sectors, with a low occurrence in the premidnight sector, consistent with both Galileo and Juno observations and predictions by Delamere & Bagenal. The magnetic local time (MLT)–radial distribution of magnetotail reconnection is broad, indicating that Jovian magnetotail reconnection is always dynamic rather than steady state. Enhanced SW ram pressure can decrease the MLT coverage of magnetotail reconnection by compressing Jupiter's magnetosphere. However, the occurrence of magnetotail reconnection near the midnight and postmidnight sectors is enhanced by SW compression beyond 60 RJ, but is not significantly impacted by SW compression within 60 RJ. Conversely, SW compression suppresses reconnection in the premidnight sector, leading to a stronger dawn–dusk asymmetry in the occurrence and location of magnetotail reconnection. This study validates the applicability of the GAMERA code for simulating Jupiter’s magnetosphere and provides complementary insights into the dynamic structure and the SW response of Jupiter’s magnetosphere.

item.title: A Strong Falsification of the Universal Radial Acceleration Relation in Galaxies
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 宇宙学，径向加速度关系，星系，暗物质，加速度 在最近的研究中，发现了显示星系动力学特性的普遍关系。其中，径向加速度关系（RAR）是最受欢迎的关系之一，可以视为连接星系中的动力学径向加速度和重子加速度的普遍法则。这揭示了暗物质与星系中的重子物质之间意想不到的密切联系。本文通过对最近强大的银河旋转曲线分析，导出了银河RAR（GRAR），首次表明所谓的最佳拟合通用RAR与GRAR数据偏离超过5σ。这为以往研究所声称的星系中RAR的普遍性提供了强有力的证据。

总结: 宇宙学研究发现了一种普遍关系，即径向加速度关系（RAR），它连接了星系中的动力学径向加速度和重子加速度。然而，最新研究表明，这种普遍性可能不存在，并且在银河RAR数据方面存在显著偏差。这一发现为以往研究的观点提供了强有力的反驳。
In the past few decades, many studies revealed that there exist some apparent universal relations that can describe the dynamical properties in galaxies. In particular, the radial acceleration relation (RAR) is one of the most popular relations discovered recently that can be regarded as a universal law to connect the dynamical radial acceleration with the baryonic acceleration in galaxies. This has revealed an unexpected close connection between dark matter and baryonic matter in galaxies. In this article, by following the recent robust Galactic rotation curve analyzes, we derive the Galactic RAR (GRAR) and show for the first time that the alleged best-fit universal RAR deviates from the GRAR data at more than 5σ. This provides a strong evidence to falsify the universal nature of RAR in galaxies claimed in past studies.

item.title: A Comprehensive Metallicity Analysis of J0332−3557: Establishing a z ∼ 4 Anchor for Direct Gas Metallicity and C/O Abundance Investigations
item.content:encoded:
Hubble Space Telescope, VLT/FORS2, metallicity, C/O ratio, star formation

总结: 本研究通过分析J0332-3557的光谱和光度数据，得出了其在红移z ∼ 4时的气体金属丰度和C/O比值。结果表明，J0332-3557的气体金属丰度与红移为z ∼ 0时相比有所增加，而其C/O比值较低，表明其处于星际介质碳元素富集的早期阶段。此外，J0332-3557的碳发射主要来源于其紧凑区域。这项研究为探究金属丰度和C/O比值在不同红移下的演化提供了重要的参考。
We provide one of the most comprehensive metallicity studies at z ∼ 4 by analyzing the UV/optical Hubble Space Telescope photometry and rest-frame Very Large Telescope (VLT)/FORS2 UV and VLT/XSHOOTER optical spectra of J0332−3557, a gravitationally lensed galaxy magnified by a factor of 20. With a 5σ detection of the auroral O iii] λ1666 line, we are able to derive a direct gas metallicity estimate for our target. We find Zgas , which is compatible with an increase of both the gas fraction and the outflow metal loading factor from z ∼ 0 to z ∼ 4. J0332−3557 is the most metal-rich individual galaxy at z ∼ 4 for which the C/O ratio has been measured. We derive a low log(C/O) = −1.02 ± 0.2, which suggests that J0332−3557 is in the early stages of interstellar medium carbon enrichment driven mostly by massive stars. The low C/O abundance also indicates that J0332−3557 is characterized by a low star formation efficiency, higher yields of oxygen, and longer burst duration. We find that EWC III]1906,9 is as low as ∼3 Å, and the main drivers of the low EWC III]1906,9 are the higher gas metallicity and the low C/O abundance. J0332−3557 is characterized by one diffuse and two more compact regions ∼1 kpc in size. We find that the carbon emission mostly originates in the compact knots. Our study on J0332−3557 serves as an anchor for studies investigating the evolution of metallicity and C/O abundance across different redshifts.

item.title: Exploring the Effects of Stellar Magnetism on the Potential Habitability of Exoplanets
item.content:encoded: <div> 星球、恒星、磁场、可居住区、外星生命 总结: 本研究考察了围绕恒星的类地行星在潜在的适居区的可居住性。磁场的存在和强度以及与恒星磁场的相互作用是影响外行星可能适居性的关键因素之一。同时，行星需有足够强大的磁场来抵御恒星活动的影响，并且需远离恒星以避免直接的磁场连接。研究发现，84颗外行星满足这些条件，并且被认为是未来寻找外星生命迹象的最佳目标。 <div> Considerable interest has centered on Earth-like planets orbiting in the circumstellar habitable zone (CHZ) of its star. However, the potential habitability of an exoplanet depends upon a number of additional factors, including the presence and strength of any planetary magnetic field and the interaction of this field with that of the host star. Not only must the exoplanet have a strong enough magnetic field to shield against stellar activity, but it must also orbit far enough from the star to avoid direct magnetic connectivity. We characterize stellar activity by the star’s Rossby number, Ro, the ratio of stellar rotation rate to convective turnover time. We employ a scaled model of the solar magnetic field to determine the star’s Alfvén radius, the distance at which the stellar wind becomes super-Alfvénic. Planets residing within the Alfvén surface may have a direct magnetic connection to the star and therefore not be the most viable candidates for habitability. Here, we determine the Rossby number of a sample of 1053 exoplanet-hosting stars for which the rotation rates have been observed and for which a convective turnover time can be calculated. We find that 84 exoplanets in our sample have orbits which lie inside the CHZ and that also lie outside the star’s Alfvén surface: 34 of these have been classified as terran (11) or superterran (23) planets. Applying the Alfvén surface habitability criterion yields a subset of the confirmed exoplanets that may be optimal targets for future observations in the search for signatures of life.

item.title: GAINN: The Galaxy Assembly and Interaction Neural Networks for High-redshift JWST Observations
item.content:encoded: <div> JWST, neural networks, galaxy, redshift, photometry 总结: 本文介绍了Galaxy Assembly and Interaction Neural Networks (Gainn)，这是一系列用于基于James Webb Space Telescope (JWST)光度测量预测模拟星系红移、恒星质量、暗物质和质量加权年龄的人工神经网络。文章旨在确定在11 < z < 15时预测这些变量的最佳神经网络。神经网络的输入是JWST的一个子集五个宽波段滤光片（F150W、F200W、F277W、F356W和F444W）和两个中波段滤光片（F162M和F182M）的滤光片差值。我们比较了使用不同组合的滤光片以及不同的激活函数和层数的神经网络的性能。最佳神经网络的预测红移的标准化均方根误差为，预测恒星质量的均方根误差为，预测暗物质的均方误差为，预测质量加权年龄的均方根误差为。我们还测试了Gainn对JWST观测到的MACS0647JD的实际数据的性能。Gainn对对象的第一投影（JD1）的预测呈现出标准化偏差 〈Δz〉 < 0.00228，这显著小于模板拟合方法得到的结果。我们发现，在考虑JWST的理论精度和观测资源时，最佳的滤光片组合是F277W、F356W、F162M和F200W。 <div> We present the Galaxy Assembly and Interaction Neural Networks (Gainn), a series of artificial neural networks for predicting the redshift, stellar mass, halo mass, and mass-weighted age of simulated galaxies based on James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) photometry. Our goal is to determine the best neural network for predicting these variables at 11 < z < 15. The parameters of the optimal neural network can then be used to estimate these variables for real, observed galaxies. The inputs of the neural networks are JWST filter magnitudes of a subset of five broadband filters (F150W, F200W, F277W, F356W, and F444W) and two medium-band filters (F162M and F182M). We compare the performance of the neural networks using different combinations of these filters, as well as different activation functions and numbers of layers. The best neural network predicted redshift with a normalized rms error of , stellar mass with rms = , halo mass with a mean-squared error of , and mass-weighted age with rms = . We also test the performance of Gainn on real data from MACS0647JD, an object observed by JWST. Predictions from Gainn for the first projection of the object (JD1) have normalized bias 〈Δz〉 < 0.00228, which is significantly smaller than found with template-fitting methods. We find that the optimal filter combination is F277W, F356W, F162M, and F200W when considering both theoretical accuracy and observational resources from JWST.

item.title: A Radial Decrease in Kinetic Temperature Measured with H2CO in 30 Doradus
item.content:encoded:
H2CO, star formation, feedback, 30 Doradus, R136

该研究通过对30 Doradus地区H2CO的观测，揭示了R136恒星团对周围气体的影响。研究发现，随着距离R136的距离增加，气体动力学温度呈下降趋势，暗示了恒星的加热作用。另外，研究结果表明机械加热对H2CO测量温度的影响不明显。此外，在ALMA的CO观测中并未观察到R136附近的机械反馈增强的迹象。该地区的宇宙射线通量估计不确定，但可能解释了观测到的温度情况。研究还表明，H2CO发射气体受R136直接辐射和光解区光电加热的影响。总结: 该研究通过H2CO的观测揭示了R136恒星团对周围气体的影响，并探讨了加热机制和宇宙射线通量的可能性。
Feedback from star formation is a critical component of the evolution of galaxies and their interstellar medium. At parsec scales internal to molecular clouds, however, the observed signatures of that feedback on the physical properties of CO-emitting gas have often been weak or inconclusive. We present subparsec observations of H2CO in the 30 Doradus region, which contains the massive star cluster R136 that is clearly exerting feedback on its neighboring gas. H2CO provides a direct measure of gas kinetic temperature, and we find a trend of decreasing temperature with projected distance from R136 that may be indicative of gas heating by the stars. While it has been suggested that mechanical heating affects H2CO-measured temperature, we do not observe any correlation between TK and line width. The lack of an enhancement in mechanical feedback close to R136 is consistent with the absence of a radial trend in gravitational boundedness seen the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array CO observations. Estimates of cosmic-ray flux in the region are quite uncertain, but can plausibly explain the observed temperatures if R136 itself is the dominant local source of energetic protons. The observations presented here are also consistent with the H2CO-emitting gas near R136 being dominated by direct radiation from R136 and photoelectric heating in the photodissociation regions.

item.title: Formation Channels of Diffuse Lights in Groups and Clusters over Time
item.content:encoded:
宇宙尘埃（diffuse lights）, N体模拟（N-body simulations）, 星系（galaxies）, 组和团（groups and clusters）, 红移（redshift） 总结:

这篇文章探讨了宇宙尘埃在红移为1.5时的形成情况和主要形成机制。研究发现，无论宿主暗物质晕的质量或动力状态如何，贡献宇宙尘埃的Typical progenitors都以含有大量星系的巨型星系的形式进入暗物质晕。此外，在未动态稳定或更庞大的宿主暗物质晕中，来自含有大质量的Typical progenitors的宇宙尘埃更加显著，且其中一半以上已经在进入宿主暗物质晕之前经历了预处理过程。宇宙尘埃的主要形成机制是卫星星系的剥离过程，而40%-45%的宇宙尘埃星系与最明亮星系的合并树相关。此外，宇宙尘埃在具有相似质量的宿主暗物质晕中所占的比例随着红移的增加而减少，但在z=1.5时已经相当可观（约为10%）。然而，值得注意的是，与可观测半径和微弱表面亮度相关的探测限制可能会掩盖大量宇宙尘埃星系，甚至改变宇宙尘埃的主要形成渠道。
We explore the formation of the intragroup light and intracluster light, representing diffuse lights within groups and clusters, from the point that z = 1.5. For this, we perform multiresolution cosmological N-body simulations using the “galaxy replacement technique” and identify the progenitors in which the diffuse light stars existed when they fell into the groups or clusters. Our findings reveal that typical progenitors contributing to diffuse lights enter the host halo with massive galaxies containing a stellar mass of , regardless of the mass or dynamical state of the host halos at z = 0. In cases where the host halos are dynamically unrelaxed or more massive, diffuse lights from massive progenitors with are more prominent, with over half of them already preprocessed before entering the host halo. Additionally, we find that the main formation mechanism of diffuse lights is the stripping process of satellites, and a substantial fraction (40%–45%) of diffuse light stars are linked to the merger tree of the brightest cluster galaxy. Remarkably, all trends persist for groups and clusters at higher redshifts. The fraction of diffuse lights in the host halos with a similar mass decreases as the redshift increases, but they are already substantial at z = 1.5 (∼10%). However, it is crucial to acknowledge that detection limits related to the observable radius and faint-end surface brightness may obscure numerous diffuse light stars and even alter the main formation channel of diffuse lights.

item.title: Nucleosynthesis in the Innermost Ejecta of Magnetorotational Supernova Explosions in Three Dimensions
item.content:encoded: <div> 磁转变超新星，核合成，磁场，转动能量，3D模拟 总结: 研究人员使用CoCoNuT-FMT代码模拟了3D磁转变超新星模型的内部喷射产生的核合成产物。结果显示，强磁场可以提取原中子星的转动能量，导致爆炸比 typcial 的中微子驱动超新星早且更有能量（约3×1051 erg）。与无磁参考模型相比，磁转变模型的喷射物具有更多的中子丰富成分，Ye值降至约0.25。后处理计算表明，磁转变模型能够产生重元素，直到质量数约130。分析显示，两个磁转变模型（初始磁场强度分别为1010 G和1012 G）在重元素合成方面几乎没有差异，这与它们类似的爆炸动力学一致。此外，磁转变模型产生的放射性的56Ni质量约为0.19和0.14 M☉，接近超新星核合成的镍质量。研究结果已在Zenodo上公开发布，可供与恒星丰度图案比较，并用于建模银河化学演化，并与其他产物计算进行比较。这些结果丰富了三维磁转变超新星模拟的核合成产物研究，有助于量化产物的不确定性。 <div> Core-collapse supernova (CCSN) explosions powered by rotation and magnetic fields present an interesting astrophysical site for nucleosynthesis that potentially contributes to the production of r-process elements. Here we present yields of the innermost ejecta in 3D magnetorotational CCSN models simulated using the CoCoNuT-FMT code. Strong magnetic fields tap the rotational energy of the proto−neutron star and lead to earlier and more energetic (∼3 × 1051 erg) explosions than typical neutrino-driven CCSNe. Compared to a reference nonmagnetic model, the ejecta in the magnetorotational models have much more neutron-rich components with Ye down to ∼0.25. Our post-processing calculations with the reaction network SkyNet show significant production of weak r-process elements up to mass number ∼130. We find negligible differences in the synthesis of heavy elements between two magnetorotational models with different initial field strengths of 1010 and 1012 G, in accord with their similar explosion dynamics. The magnetorotational models produce about ∼0.19 and 0.14 M☉ of radioactive 56Ni, on the low end of inferred hypernova nickel masses. The yields are publicly available at Zenodo (doi: 10.5281/zenodo.10578981) for comparison with stellar abundance patterns, inclusion in modeling galactic chemical evolution, and comparison with other yield calculations. Our results add to the yet-restricted corpus of nucleosynthesis yields from 3D magnetorotational supernova simulations and will help quantify yield uncertainties.

item.title: The Long-period Spectroscopic Orbit and Dust Creation in the Wolf–Rayet Binary System WR 125
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 长周期双星，碳丰富的Wolf–Rayet恒星，尘埃形成，红外暴发，光谱能量分布 总结: 本文报告了一个包含碳丰富的Wolf–Rayet星和一个OB星的长周期双星系统WR 125的最新观测结果。该系统出现了自1991年以来首次被NEOWISE-R探测到的红外暴发。研究者利用新的近红外和中红外光度测量数据验证了这两次暴发的一致性，并推导出了该系统的轨道周期。另外，通过光谱测量和分析，他们还确定了该系统的轨道偏心率，并对尘埃的性质和温度进行了研究。这些观测结果为未来的观测规划和尘埃形成的Wolf–Rayet双星系统研究提供了重要参考。

Several long-period binaries with a carbon-rich Wolf–Rayet star and an OB star produce dust in their wind collisions. In eccentric binaries, this is seen most strongly near periastron passage. The exact conditions leading to dust creation require the orbital properties to be determined, which is difficult owing to their long periods. Recently, the binary system WR 125 (WC7 + O9III) began a dust-creation episode seen through an infrared outburst first detected by NEOWISE-R, which was the first outburst detected since 1991. We present new near- and mid-infrared photometry, which we use to show consistency between the two outbursts and derive an orbital period of yr. We use a long time series of optical spectra to place the first constraints on its orbital elements, on the assumption that this system will produce dust near periastron. The orbit has a mild eccentricity of 0.29 ± 0.12 and is only derived for the Wolf–Rayet component, as the O star’s radial velocities have noise that is likely larger than the expected semiamplitude of the orbit. We also present SOFIA/FORCAST grism spectroscopy to examine the infrared spectral energy distribution of the dust during this outburst, comparing its properties to other WCd binaries, and deriving a dust temperature of 580 K in 2021. This collection of observations will allow us to plan future observations of this system and place the system in the context of dust-creating Wolf–Rayet binaries.

item.title: Expected Gamma-Ray Burst Detection Rates and Redshift Distributions for the BlackCAT CubeSat Mission
item.content:encoded:
探测，GRBs，BlackCAT CubeSat，模拟，敏感度 BlackCAT CubeSat是一个NASA APRA资助的CubeSat任务，旨在探测和实时亚角秒定位高红移（z≳3.5）的伽玛射线暴（GRBs）。通过对GRBs的探测，BlackCAT能够定位高红移星系和星际介质，还能够对高红移星系的局部和大尺度结构进行深入的搜索。研究采用了两个不同的GRBs红移分布和光度函数模型进行模拟，发现BlackCAT预计每年在轨道上探测到平均42次爆发，其中6.7%至10%的GRBs处于z>3.5。BlackCAT能够在秒级内将爆发位置信息提供给科研机构，并且由于其轨道和指向方案，爆发将在夜空中得到精确定位，有利于进行深层次的多波段跟踪观测。BlackCAT计划于2025年具备发射准备。

总结: 摘要: BlackCAT CubeSat是一个NASA APRA资助的CubeSat任务，旨在探测和实时亚角秒定位高红移（z≳3.5）的伽玛射线暴（GRBs）。研究结果表明，BlackCAT预计每年在轨道上探测到平均42次爆发，其中6.7%至10%的GRBs处于z>3.5。由于其轨道和指向方案，爆发将在夜空中得到精确定位，有利于进行深层次的多波段跟踪观测。BlackCAT计划于2025年具备发射准备。
We report the results of an extensive set of simulations exploring the sensitivity of the BlackCAT CubeSat to long-duration gamma-ray bursts (GRBs). BlackCAT is a NASA APRA-funded CubeSat mission for the detection and real-time subarcminute localization of high-redshift (z ≳ 3.5) GRBs. Thanks to their luminous and long-lived afterglow emissions, GRBs are uniquely valuable probes of high-redshift star-forming galaxies and the intergalactic medium. In addition, each detected GRB with a known redshift serves to localize a region of high-redshift star formation in three dimensions, enabling deep follow-on searches for host galaxies and associated local and large-scale structures. We explore two distinct models for the GRB redshift distribution and luminosity function, both consistent with Swift observations. We find that, for either model, BlackCAT is expected to detect a mean of 42 bursts per year on orbit, with 6.7% to 10% of these at z > 3.5. BlackCAT bursts will be localized to an r90 ≲ 55″ precision and reported to the community within seconds. Due to the mission orbit and pointing scheme, bursts will be located in the night sky and well placed for deep multiwavelength follow-up observations. BlackCAT is on schedule to achieve launch readiness in 2025.

item.title: AT2021lwx: Another Neutrino-coincident Tidal Disruption Event with a Strong Dust Echo?
item.content:encoded:
IC220405B, AT2021lwx, Tidal Disruption Event, Neutrino, Isotropic Emission Model 这篇文章讨论了天体物理中微中微子IC220405B和最近报道的极端高能潮汐撕裂事件(TDE)候选对象AT2021lwx (ZTF20abrbeie, 别名“Scary Barbie”)之间可能的关联。尽管TDE与重建的中微子事件方向相差2°6'（超出90%置信水平定位区域之外），但TDE候选对象与迄今为止报道的中微子-TDE关联具有一些重要特征：强红外灰尘回波、高玻色度光度、相对于峰值质量吸积率存在约百天的中微子时间延迟和高观测到的X射线光度。我们使用各向同性辐射模型来解释这种新的关联，其中中微子是由加速质子与红外光子碰撞产生的。在考虑AT2021lwx的高红移之后（通过在超大质量黑洞(SMBH)框架中解释数据），我们发现预期的中微子通量和中微子时间延迟在 qualitatively 上与其他TDEs是可比较的。由于数据仅在SMBH框架内的峰值后300天可用，灰尘回波解释存在显著的不确定性，因此在预测检测到的中微子数量方面也存在不确定性。我们建议对这个物体进行进一步的延长期跟踪，并建议在这种特殊情况下修改中微子到达方向的重建。

总结: 中微子IC220405B与高能潮汐撕裂事件AT2021lwx可能存在关联，尽管它们的方向有所偏差，但它们共享了一些重要的特征，如红外灰尘回波、高玻色度光度、中微子时间延迟和高观测X射线光度。使用各向同性辐射模型解释这种新的关联后，发现预期的中微子通量和中微子时间延迟与其他潮汐撕裂事件是可比较的，并建议对该物体进行进一步跟踪。
We discuss the possible association of an astrophysical neutrino (IC220405B) with the recently reported, extremely energetic tidal disruption event (TDE) candidate AT2021lwx (ZTF20abrbeie, aka “Scary Barbie”) at redshift z = 0.995. Although the TDE is about 2.°6 off the direction of the reconstructed neutrino event (outside the 90% confidence level localization region), the TDE candidate shares some important characteristics with so-far-reported neutrino–TDE associations: a strong infrared dust echo, high bolometric luminosity, a neutrino time delay with respect to the peak mass accretion rate of the order of a hundred days, and a high observed X-ray luminosity. We interpret this new association using an isotropic emission model, where neutrinos are produced by the collision of accelerated protons with infrared photons. After accounting for the high redshift of AT2021lwx (by interpreting the data in the supermassive black hole (SMBH) frame), we find that the expected neutrino fluences and neutrino time delays are qualitatively comparable to the other TDEs. Since data are only available up to 300 days postpeak in the SMBH frame, significant uncertainties exist in the dust echo interpretation, and therefore in the predicted number of neutrinos detected, . We recommend further follow-up of this object for an extended period and suggest refining the reconstruction of the neutrino arrival direction in this particular case.

item.title: Infrared Band Strengths of Dangling OH Features in Amorphous Water at 20 K
item.content:encoded: Infrared (IR) spectra of vapor-deposited amorphous water at low temperatures show two weak peaks at around 3720 and 3696 cm−1 assigned to free-OH stretching modes of two- and three-coordinated water molecules (so-called “dangling” OH bonds), respectively, on the ice surface. A recent JWST observation first succeeded in detection of a potential dangling OH feature at 3664 cm−1 for ices in molecular clouds, highlighting the importance of dangling OH bonds in interstellar ice chemistry. A lack of band strengths of these features at low temperatures restricts the quantification of dangling OH bonds from IR spectra, hindering development of a molecular-level understanding of the surface structure and chemistry of ice. Using IR multiple-angle incidence resolution spectrometry, we quantified the band strengths of two- and three-coordinated dangling OH features in amorphous water at 20 K as being 4.6 ± 1.6 × 10−18 and 9.1 ± 1.0 × 10−18 cm molecule−1, respectively. These values are more than an order of magnitude lower than band strengths of bulk-water molecules in ice and liquid water and are similar to those of H2O monomers confined in solid matrices. Adsorption of carbon monoxide with dangling OH bonds results in the appearance of a new broad dangling OH feature at 3680–3620 cm−1, with a band strength of 1.8 ± 0.1 × 10−17 cm molecule−1. The band strengths of dangling OH features determined in this study advance our understanding of the surface structure of interstellar ice analogs and recent IR observations of the JWST.

item.title: Numerical Simulation of Equal Ratio Relations for the Peak Intensities of >10 MeV Energetic Protons
item.content:encoded: Previous studies have highlighted the significance of perpendicular diffusion in the decay phase of particle intensities for >10 MeV energetic protons. Recently, an observational study has indicated that the peak intensity ratios across different energy channels (13−64 MeV protons) remain almost constant as the spacecraft location varies in many solar proton events. This interesting phenomenon is referred to as equal ratio relations. These findings suggest that perpendicular diffusion not only affects particle intensity during the decay phase but also throughout the rising phase. In this study, we perform numerical simulations of >10 MeV energetic proton events observed by STEREO A, STEREO B, and the Solar and Heliospheric Observatory. Our findings demonstrate that perpendicular diffusion strongly affects the entire time profile of particle intensity for spacecraft not magnetically connected to the source region. The numerical simulation results indicate that in order to reproduce observations, we need to include perpendicular diffusion near the source region and in interplanetary space. Perpendicular diffusion leads to nearly uniform peak ratios at different locations and contributes to the formation of the reservoir phenomenon during the decay phase. Consequently, these numerical results support the significant role of perpendicular diffusion in the formation of the longitudinal distribution of >10 MeV proton events.

item.title: A Sample of Compact Object Candidates in Single-lined Spectroscopic Binaries from LAMOST Medium-resolution Survey
item.content:encoded:
LAMOST, medium-resolution survey, compact objects, radial-velocity variation, single-lined spectroscopic binaries

LAMOST中分辨率观测结果显示，可以用于搜索双星系统中的紧凑天体。数据发布10目录中包括980,000多个目标，其中有多个中分辨率光谱。筛选出具有大或快速径向速度变化的目标，得到1822个样本。使用光变曲线和光谱识别和排除了食双星和双线谱二元系统。最终得到了一个包含89个候选天体的目录，这些系统都是单线谱二元系统，表明每个系统中都存在一个未见伴星。根据径向速度曲线，可以很好地确定每个系统的质量函数。在样本中，有26个天体的质量函数超过0.1 M⊙，其中18个天体具有椭圆光变曲线。我们认为所有这26个双星系统中很可能存在紧凑天体，值得进行后续的鉴定工作。

总结: LAMOST中分辨率观测结果可以用于搜索双星系统中的紧凑天体，筛选出1822个样本，最终得到89个单线谱二元系统的候选天体目录。其中26个天体可能存在紧凑天体，值得进行后续的鉴定工作。
The stellar spectra from the Large Sky Area Multi-Object Fiber Spectroscopic Telescope (LAMOST) medium-resolution survey can be used to search for compact objects in binaries. The LAMOST Data Release 10 catalog includes >980,000 targets with multiple medium-resolution spectra. We select the targets with large or rapid radial-velocity variation, and obtained an input sample of 1822 sources. We use light curves and spectra to identify and exclude eclipsing binaries and double-lined spectroscopic binaries in the input sample. We finally derive a catalog of 89 candidates with well-folded radial velocity, which are all single-lined spectroscopic binaries, indicating an unseen companion residing in each system. The mass function of each system can be well constrained based on the radial-velocity curve. In our sample, 26 sources have mass function higher than 0.1 M⊙, among which 18 sources have ellipsoidal-type light curves. In our opinion, compact objects are likely existent in all these 26 binaries, which are worth follow-up identification.

item.title: Breaking Giant Chains: Early-stage Instabilities in Long-period Giant Planet Systems
item.content:encoded:
关键词: 轨道演化, 巨行星, 共振链, N-体模拟, 行星系统 总结:

本研究使用N-体模拟模拟了巨行星系统的不稳定演化过程，从共振的初始条件开始，经过盘的消散和其他阶段。通过比较合成系统的周期比和标准化角动量分布与长周期木星型行星的观测统计，得出了关于轨道迁移速率、气体驱动偏心率阻尼效率和典型初始多重性的约束条件。研究发现，倾向于初始条件密集、阻尼效果较弱和巨行星数目较高。此外，模型表明，共振链的起源并不能以足够高的速率通过共面高偏心率路径形成热木星，以解释它们的观测普遍性。
Orbital evolution is a critical process that sculpts planetary systems, particularly during their early stages where planet–disk interactions are expected to lead to the formation of resonant chains. Despite the theoretically expected prominence of such configurations, they are scarcely observed among long-period giant exoplanets. This disparity suggests an evolutionary sequence wherein giant planet systems originate in compact multiresonant configurations, but subsequently become unstable, eventually relaxing to wider orbits—a phenomenon mirrored in our own solar system’s early history. In this work, we present a suite of N-body simulations that model the instability-driven evolution of giant planet systems, originating from resonant initial conditions, through phases of disk dispersal and beyond. By comparing the period ratio and normalized angular momentum distributions of our synthetic aggregate of systems with the observational census of long-period Jovian planets, we derive constraints on the expected rate of orbital migration, the efficiency of gas-driven eccentricity damping, and typical initial multiplicity. Our findings reveal a distinct inclination toward densely packed initial conditions, weak damping, and high giant planet multiplicities. Furthermore, our models indicate that resonant chain origins do not facilitate the formation of Hot Jupiters via the coplanar high-eccentricity pathway at rates high enough to explain their observed prevalence.

item.title: ALMA Reveals Spatially Resolved Properties of Molecular Gas in the Host Galaxy of FRB 20191001A at z = 0.2340
item.content:encoded:
FRB, CO(2-1) emission, Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array, molecular gas, host galaxy

这篇文章报告了使用Atacama大型毫米/亚毫米阵列从快速无线电暴(FRB) 20191001A的宿主星系中检测到CO(2-1)发射线，其空间分辨率达到0.9″(相当于3.5千秒差距) ，红移z = 0.2340。这是以宇宙距离探测到的第一个FRB宿主星系的空间分辨CO发射。推断出宿主星系的分子气体质量为(2.3 ± 0.4) × 1010M⊙，表明其富含气体，所得的分子气体比例μgas = 0.50 ± 0.22。这种分子气体质量和宿主星系的恒星形成率SFR = (8.06 ± 2.42) M⊙ yr−1，与其他FRB宿主星系观察到的分子气体质量Mgas = 9.6 × 108M⊙和SFR = 0.90M⊙ yr−1有所不同。这进一步证实了FRB可能起源于多样化星系环境中的单个或多个祖先的假设。基于观察到的速度场建模，分子气体盘主要由有序的循环旋转主导，尽管宿主星系有一个富含气体的伴星系，投影距离约为25 kpc。FRB祖先的形成可能并不是由这种相互作用触发的。我们推导了FRB检测点的分子气体柱密度的3σ上限为<2.1 × 1021 cm−2。

总结: - 通过ALMA探测到FRB宿主星系的CO(2-1)发射线，第一次在宇宙距离实现了这一成就。 - 推测宿主星系的分子气体质量和星形成率与其他FRB宿主星系有所不同，支持FRB可能起源于不同星系环境的假设。 - 分子气体盘显示出有序循环旋转，伴星系的影响可能并不是FRB祖先形成的触发因素。
We report the detection of the CO(2–1) emission line with a spatial resolution of 0.″9 (3.5 kpc) from the host galaxy of the fast radio burst (FRB), FRB 20191001A at z = 0.2340, using the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array. This is the first detection of spatially resolved CO emission from the host galaxy of an FRB at a cosmological distance. The inferred molecular gas mass of the host galaxy is (2.3 ± 0.4) × 1010M⊙, indicating that it is gas-rich, as evidenced by the measured molecular gas fraction μgas = 0.50 ± 0.22. This molecular gas mass and the star formation rate of the host, SFR = (8.06 ± 2.42) M⊙ yr−1, differ from those observed in the other FRB host galaxies with the average Mgas = 9.6 × 108M⊙ and SFR = 0.90M⊙ yr−1. This lends further credibility to the hypothesis that FRBs may originate from single or multiple progenitors across a diverse range of galaxy environments. Based on the observed velocity field modeling, we find that the molecular gas disk is dominated by an ordered circular rotation, despite the fact that the host galaxy has a gas-rich companion galaxy with a projected separation of ∼25 kpc. The formation of the FRB’s progenitor might not have been triggered by this interaction. We derive the 3σ upper limit of the molecular gas column density at the FRB detection site to be <2.1 × 1021 cm−2 with a 3σ upper limit.

item.title: GRB 231115A: A Nearby Magnetar Giant Flare or a Cosmic Short Gamma-Ray Burst?
item.content:encoded:
GRBs, cosmic short gamma-ray bursts, neutron star mergers, magnetar giant flares, prompt emission GRB 231115A 是一次持续时间较短的伽玛射线暴 (GRB)，其在频谱性质上与磁星巨型耀斑 (GF) 相似，但其能量差异较大，据称可能与M82星系相关联。研究人员对其俯冲射线的性质进行了详细分析，认为其性质符合磁星巨型耀斑的特征。然而，要成为一次短暴，其红移需要约为1，尽管这种可能性较低，但现有的X射线/GeV观测结果的上限不足以进一步排除这种可能性。此外，对于今后能够确立 GRB 231115A 这类事件的磁星起源提出了展望。

总结:
GRB 231115A 是一次持续时间较短的伽玛射线暴，可能与磁星巨型耀斑相关联。研究人员对其俯冲射线的性质进行了详细分析，认为其性质符合磁星巨型耀斑的特征。然而，要成为一次短暴，其红移需要约为1。现有的X射线/GeV观测结果的上限不足以进一步排除这种可能性。此外，对于今后能够确立 GRB 231115A 这类事件的磁星起源提出了展望。
There are two classes of gamma-ray transients with a duration shorter than 2 s. One consists of cosmic short gamma-ray bursts (GRBs) taking place in the deep Universe via the neutron star mergers, and the other is the magnetar giant flares (GFs) with energies of ∼1044 − 1046 erg from “nearby” galaxies. Though the magnetar GFs and the short GRBs have rather similar temporal and spectral properties, their energies (Eγ,iso) are different by quite a few orders of magnitude and hence can be distinguished supposing the host galaxies have been robustly identified. The newly observed GRB 231115A has been widely discussed as a new GF event for its high probability of being associated with M82. Here we conduct a detailed analysis of its prompt emission observed by Fermi-GBM and compare the parameters with existing observations. The prompt gamma-ray emission properties of GRB 231115A, if associated with M82, nicely follow the Ep,z–Eγ,iso relation of the GFs, where Ep,z is the peak energy of the gamma-ray spectrum after the redshift (z) correction. To be a short GRB, the redshift needs to be ∼1. Though such a chance is low, the available X-ray/GeV observation upper limits are not stringent enough to further rule out this possibility. We have also discussed the prospect of convincingly establishing the magnetar origin of GRB 231115A-like events in the future.

item.title: Consistent Eccentricities for Gravitational-wave Astronomy: Resolving Discrepancies between Astrophysical Simulations and Waveform Models
item.content:encoded:
Gravitational waves, eccentricity, binary black holes, astrophysical simulations, reference frequency
在这篇文章中，研究者们探讨了在引力波信号中探测轨道离心率的痕迹，以揭示双黑洞的形成机制。他们发现，通过对比来自数值模拟的形成途径得出的离心率分布和从引力波信号中推断出的离心率估计，可以限制形成机制。研究人员报告说，现有引力波信号和天体物理模拟中使用的离心率定义不一致，主要是由于两者使用了不同的基准频率。他们提出了一种从天体物理模拟中计算离心率的方法，并发现存在重要差异。也就是说，现有研究中的引力波信号和天体物理形成渠道的离心率限制可能存在较大的差异。因此，在比较基于数据的离心率约束和天体物理形成渠道的期望时，需要谨慎对待这一差异。

总结: 这篇文章主要讨论了从引力波信号中探测双黑洞形成机制的轨道离心率痕迹，提出了用于天体物理模拟中计算离心率的方法，并发现了现有研究中的巨大差异。
Detecting imprints of orbital eccentricity in gravitational-wave (GW) signals promises to shed light on the formation mechanisms of binary black holes. To constrain the formation mechanisms, distributions of eccentricity derived from numerical simulations of astrophysical formation channels are compared to the estimates of eccentricity inferred from GW signals. We report that the definition of eccentricity typically used in astrophysical simulations is inconsistent with the one used while modeling GW signals, with the differences mainly arising due to the choice of reference frequency used in both cases. We also posit a prescription for calculating eccentricity from astrophysical simulations, by evolving ordinary differential equations obtained from post-Newtonian theory and using the dominant (ℓ = m = 2) mode’s frequency as the reference frequency; this ensures consistency in the definitions. On comparing the existing eccentricities of the binaries present in the Cluster Monte Carlo catalog of globular cluster simulations with the eccentricities calculated using the prescription presented here, we find a significant discrepancy at e ≳ 0.2; this discrepancy becomes worse with increasing eccentricity. We note the implications this discrepancy has for existing studies and recommend that care be taken when comparing data-driven constraints on eccentricity to expectations from astrophysical formation channels.

item.title: Ensemble Variability Properties of Active Galactic Nuclei in the SDSS DR17
item.content:encoded: <div> AGN, variability, luminosity, accretion rate, black hole mass 总结: 这项研究对近9600个宽线选择的活动星系核（AGN）进行了研究，它们的宿主星系由Sloan Digital Sky Survey（SDSS）数据发布17号检测到。研究通过对比原始SDSS光度数据和在接下来几天到几十年内在Sloan g、r和i波段测得的光谱光度测量来计算整体变异性统计。通过对SDSS光谱拟合星系和AGN模板，研究分离出了AGN组分和宿主星系。研究对象的绝对星等在-24 < Mi < -18之间，且处于红移小于z ∼ 0.9范围内。变异性分析显示，亮度和变化幅度之间的反相关关系延伸至log(Lbol [erg s−1]) = 43.5，证明了这种关系在AGN光度上延伸了4个数量级。为了进一步探索AGN光度和变异性之间的关系，研究测定了Hβ线宽和静止5100 Å波长处的单色光度来确定黑洞质量和吸积率。研究结果表明，吸积率是影响变异幅度的主要参数，并且吸积率与振幅之间的反相关关系延伸至低至1% Eddington的吸积率。此外，研究还发现了变异幅度与黑洞质量之间的反相关关系，其中与低吸积率的AGN间的相关性最强。 <div> We present the results from a study of ∼9600 broadline-selected active galactic nuclei (AGNs) with host galaxies detected from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) Data Release 17. We compute ensemble variability statistics based on a comparison of the original SDSS photometric data with spectrophotometric measurements obtained days to decades later in the Sloan g, r, and i bands. Galaxy and AGN templates have been fitted to the SDSS spectra to isolate the AGN component from the host galaxy. The sources have absolute magnitudes in the range −24 < Mi < −18 and lie at redshifts less than z ∼ 0.9. A variability analysis reveals that the anticorrelation between luminosity and variability amplitude continues down to log(Lbol [erg s−1]) = 43.5, demonstrating that the relationship extends by 4 orders of magnitude in AGN luminosity. To further explore the connection between AGN luminosity and variability, we determine the black hole mass and the accretion rate through measurement of the Hβ line width and the monochromatic luminosity at rest frame 5100 Å. Our results suggest that the accretion rate is the dominant parameter impacting the amplitude of variability and that the anticorrelation between the accretion rate and amplitude extends to rates as low as 1% Eddington. Moreover, we also identify an anticorrelation between the variability amplitude and black hole mass, with the correlation appearing strongest among the AGNs with low accretion rates.

item.title: Streaming Instability and Turbulence: Conditions for Planetesimal Formation
item.content:encoded:
planetesimal formation, streaming instability, aerodynamic interactions, particle self-gravity, turbulent forcing 总结：

本文研究了通过气体的两向空气动力学相互作用来实现固体浓缩，以及最终形成类地行星的流动不稳定性。作者进行了3D层流剪切盒模拟，并发现强制湍流可以显著增加所需的浓度阈值，作者还提供了临界Z的单一拟合值，并估计了考虑了粒子反馈和外部湍流的粒子尺度高度。最终实验表明，形成类地行星需要超过单位的粒子与气体的密度比值。
The streaming instability (SI) is a leading candidate for planetesimal formation, which can concentrate solids through two-way aerodynamic interactions with the gas. The resulting concentrations can become sufficiently dense to collapse under particle self-gravity, forming planetesimals. Previous studies have carried out large parameter surveys to establish the critical particle to gas surface density ratio (Z), above which SI-induced concentration triggers planetesimal formation. The threshold Z depends on the dimensionless stopping time (τs, a proxy for dust size). However, these studies neglected both particle self-gravity and external turbulence. Here, we perform 3D stratified shearing box simulations with both particle self-gravity and turbulent forcing, which we characterize via a turbulent diffusion parameter, αD. We find that forced turbulence, at amplitudes plausibly present in some protoplanetary disks, can increase the threshold Z by up to an order of magnitude. For example, for τs = 0.01, planetesimal formation occurs when Z ≳ 0.06, ≳0.1, and ≳0.2 at αD = 10−4, 10−3.5, and 10−3, respectively. We provide a single fit to the critical Z required for the SI to work as a function of αD and τs (although limited to the range τs = 0.01–0.1). Our simulations also show that planetesimal formation requires a mid-plane particle-to-gas density ratio that exceeds unity, with the critical value being largely insensitive to αD. Finally, we provide an estimation of particle scale height that accounts for both particle feedback and external turbulence.

item.title: PAC. V. The Roles of Mass and Environment in the Quenching of Galaxies
item.content:encoded:
关键词: galactic quenching, mass, environment, Hyper Suprime-Cam Subaru Strategic Program, IllustrisTNG 总结: 通过对超级亚洲日本战略计划和Slogan数字天空调查的数据进行分析，研究了星系熄灭中质量和环境的作用。发现质量和环境熄灭都对伴随星系的演化有影响。通过量化伴随星系的熄灭分数过剩，确定高密度晕环境影响星形成熄灭的程度。得出了一个适用于限制星系形成模型的拟合公式。与IllustrisTNG进行了定量比较，发现在低质量伴随星系方面存在重要差异。

总结: 该研究分析了星系熄灭中质量和环境的作用，发现两者都对伴随星系的演化有影响。研究还量化了高密度晕环境影响星形成熄灭的程度，并提出了一个适用于限制星系形成模型的拟合公式。此外，还通过与IllustrisTNG进行了定量比较，发现在低质量伴随星系方面存在重要差异。
The roles that mass and environment play in galaxy quenching are still under debate. Leveraging the Photometric objects Around Cosmic webs method, we analyze the excess surface distribution of photometric galaxies in different colors (rest-frame u − r) within the stellar mass range of 109.0 ∼ 1011.0M⊙ around spectroscopic massive central galaxies (1010.9 ∼ 1011.7M⊙) at the redshift interval of 0 < zs < 0.7, utilizing data from the Hyper Suprime-Cam Subaru Strategic Program and the spectroscopic samples of Slogan Digital Sky Survey (i.e., Main, LOWZ, and CMASS samples). We find that both mass and environmental quenching contribute to the evolution of companion galaxies. To isolate the environmental effect, we quantify the quenched fraction excess (QFE) of companion galaxies encircling massive central galaxies within 0.01h−1 Mpc < rp < 20h−1 Mpc, representing the surplus quenched fraction relative to the average. We find that the high-density halo environment affects star formation quenching up to about three times the virial radius, and this effect becomes stronger at lower redshift. We also find that even after being scaled by the virial radius, the environmental quenching efficiency is higher for more massive halos or for companion galaxies of higher stellar mass, though the trends are quite weak. We present a fitting formula that comprehensively captures the QFE across central and companion stellar mass bins, halo-centric distance bins, and redshift bins, offering a valuable tool for constraining galaxy formation models. Furthermore, we have made a quantitative comparison with IllustrisTNG that underscores some important differences, particularly in the excessive quenching of low-mass companion galaxies (<109.5M⊙) in the simulation.

item.title: Chandra Study of the Proper Motion of HST-1 in the Jet of M87
item.content:encoded: <div> M87, radio galaxy, jet, X-ray image, flux variability 总结: M87是一个著名的射电星系，其射流中的HST-1节点在X射线波段具有明亮的光结，我们分析了这个节点的X射线图像和通量变化。我们使用了2000年至2021年间112次Chandra ACIS-S观测数据进行了分析，总曝光时间为884千秒。通过解卷积图像研究了X射线射流的亮度分布，并测量了核心和HST-1的相对距离。从2003年到2005年（与HST-1的明亮闪耀同时），我们发现HST-1的通量与其与核心的偏移之间存在相关性。在随后的数据中，我们发现这种偏移稳定增加，这意味着HST-1的速度为6.6 ± 0.9c（2.0 ± 0.3 pc yr−1），与先前的结果一致。我们讨论了通量-偏移相关性的模型，这些模型包括了两个或四个相距数十秒差距的发射区域。我们将这些结果归因于射流中的移动激波，这使我们能够测量射流的内部结构。 <div> The radio galaxy M87 is well known for its jet, which features a series of bright knots observable from radio to X-ray wavelengths. We analyze the X-ray image and flux variability of the knot HST-1 in the jet. Our analysis includes all 112 available Chandra ACIS-S observations from 2000 to 2021, with a total exposure time of ∼884 ks. We use deconvolved images to study the brightness profile of the X-ray jet and measure the relative separation between the core and HST-1. From 2003 to 2005 (which coincides with a bright flare from HST-1), we find a correlation between the flux of HST-1 and its offset from the core. In subsequent data, we find a steady increase in this offset, which implies a bulk superluminal motion for HST-1 of 6.6 ± 0.9 c (2.0 ± 0.3 pc yr−1), in keeping with prior results. We discuss models for the flux–offset correlation that feature either two or four emission regions separated by tens of parsecs. We attribute these results to moving shocks in the jet, which allow us to measure the internal structure of the jet.

item.title: Multiband Simultaneous Photometry of Type II SN 2023ixf with Mephisto and the Twin 50 cm Telescopes
item.content:encoded: <div> 光度观测，多波段，超新星，核心坍塌，尘埃 总结: 本文报告了对M101星系中SN 2023ixf的多波段光度观测结果。超新星的绝对光度在爆发后3.9天达到最大值，之后逐渐稳定至约90天。有效温度在最初的观测后逐渐下降，并在两个月后稳定在约(3000-4000)K。光球半径的演化与速度呈现出类似于全同展开的趋势，并在之后缩小。根据放射性尾迹，初始镍质量约为0.098太阳质量。爆炸能量和喷射物质量分别估计为E ≃(1.0-5.7) × 10^51 erg和Mej ≃(3.8-16)太阳质量。峰值绝对光度被认为是喷射物与周围介质（CSM）相互作用的结果。我们发现一个冲击形成的CSM质量为MCSM ≃0.013太阳质量，CSM密度为ρCSM ≃2.5 × 10^-13克/厘米^3，以及一个前体恒星的质量损失率。 <div> SN 2023ixf, recently reported in the nearby galaxy M101 at a distance of 6.85 Mpc, was one of the closest and brightest core-collapse supernovae in the last decade. In this work, we present multiwavelength photometric observation of SN 2023ixf with the Multi-channel Photometric Survey Telescope (Mephisto) in the uvgr bands and with the twin 50 cm telescopes in the griz bands. We find that the bolometric luminosity reached the maximum value of 3 × 1043 erg s−1 at 3.9 days after the explosion and fully settled onto the radioactive tail at ∼90 days. The effective temperature decreased from 3.2 × 104 K at the first observation and approached a constant of ∼(3000–4000) K after the first 2 months. The evolution of the photospheric radius is consistent with a homologous expansion with a velocity of 8700 km s−1 in the first 2 months, and it shrunk subsequently. Based on the radioactive tail, the initial nickel mass is about MNi ∼ 0.098 M⊙. The explosion energy and the ejecta mass are estimated to be E ≃ (1.0–5.7) × 1051 erg and Mej ≃ (3.8–16) M⊙, respectively. The peak bolometric luminosity is proposed to be contributed by the interaction between the ejecta and the circumstellar medium (CSM). We find a shocked CSM mass of MCSM ∼ 0.013 M⊙, a CSM density of ρCSM ∼ 2.5 × 10−13 g cm−3, and a mass-loss rate of the progenitor of .

item.title: Early Planet Formation in Embedded Disks (eDisk). XV. Influence of Magnetic Field Morphology in Dense Cores on Sizes of Protostellar Disks
item.content:encoded:
磁场、分子云核、星盘、磁场形态、盘半径 磁场在分子云核中可能在星盘形成过程中发挥作用。通过ALMA大型项目“嵌入盘早期行星形成（eDisk）”对16个原恒星核进行了研究，解析了它们的盘，并使用JCMT POL-2观测推导了0.1 pc尺度的磁场形态。从密核中测量了磁场的平均取向和角度离散度，并与eDisk项目中动力学测定的原恒星质量的尺度和1.3毫米连续盘的半径进行了比较。我们观察到盘的半径与恒星质量之间存在显著的相关性，但没有发现盘半径与磁场取向角或磁场角度离散度之间的统计显著依赖性。然而，在考虑投影效应时，我们不能排除盘半径与三维空间中的偏离角之间存在正相关性的可能性。我们的结果表明，密核中磁场的形态可能在盘形成过程中并不起主导作用。相反，原恒星盘的尺寸可能更受到已被吸积到星+盘系统中的质量以及可能的其他参数（例如磁场强度、核自转和磁扩散性）的影响。

总结: 研究发现密核中的磁场形态对星盘形成过程不起主导作用，星盘的尺寸更可能受到被吸积到星+盘系统中的质量以及其他参数的影响。
The magnetic field of a molecular cloud core may play a role in the formation of circumstellar disks in the core. We present magnetic field morphologies in protostellar cores of 16 targets in the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array large program “Early Planet Formation in Embedded Disks (eDisk),” which resolved their disks with 7 au resolutions. The 0.1 pc scale magnetic field morphologies were inferred from the James Clerk Maxwell Telescope POL-2 observations. The mean orientations and angular dispersions of the magnetic fields in the dense cores are measured and compared with the radii of the 1.3 mm continuum disks and the dynamically determined protostellar masses from the eDisk program. We observe a significant correlation between the disk radii and the stellar masses. We do not find any statistically significant dependence of the disk radii on the projected misalignment angles between the rotational axes of the disks and the magnetic fields in the dense cores, nor on the angular dispersions of the magnetic fields within these cores.
