item.title: Broad and Bidirectional Narrow Quasiperiodic Fast-propagating Wave Trains Associated with a Filament-driven Halo Coronal Mass Ejection on 2023 April 21
item.content:encoded:
波动火车, 快速传播, 阶段振荡, 能量释放, 爆发太阳丝
总结:
本文描述了2023年4月21日发生的三种不同的波动火车：一个宽广的准周期快速传播(QFP)波动火车和双向窄QFP波动火车。宽广的QFP波动火车以圆形波前向外扩散，而双向窄QFP波动火车分别向南北方向传播。这些波动火车的同时出现提供了一个研究它们各自触发机制的良好机会。测量结果显示，宽广的QFP波动火车在不同传播方向的速度范围为300-1100 km/s。双向窄QFP波动火车的速度有显著差异：以1400 km/s的速度向南传播，而向北传播只达到约550 km/s，并伴随着约1-2 km/s²的减速。使用小波分析，我们发现向南北方向传播的波动火车的周期性与耀斑所表现出的准周期脉动非常相似。基于这些结果，窄QFP波动火车很可能是由伴随耀斑的间歇能量释放所激发的。相反，宽广的QFP波动火车与喷发的太阳丝紧密相关，可能归因于喷发太阳丝的展开运动或者快速腔波在太阳丝体内的泄漏。
This paper presents three distinct wave trains that occurred on 2023 April 21: a broad quasiperiodic fast-propagating (QFP) wave train and bidirectional narrow QFP wave trains. The broad QFP wave train expands outward in a circular wave front, while bidirectional narrow QFP wave trains propagate in the northward and southward directions, respectively. The concurrent presence of the wave trains offers a remarkable opportunity to investigate their respective triggering mechanisms. Measurement shows that the speed of the broad QFP wave train is in the range of 300–1100 km s−1 in different propagating directions. There is a significant difference in the speed of the bidirectional narrow QFP wave trains: the southward propagation achieves 1400 km s−1, while the northward propagation only reaches about 550 km s−1 accompanied by a deceleration of about 1–2 km s−2. Using the wavelet analysis, we find that the periodicity of the propagating wave trains in the southward and northward directions closely matches the quasiperiodic pulsations exhibited by the flares. Based on these results, the narrow QFP wave trains were most likely excited by the intermittent energy release in the accompanying flare. In contrast, the broad QFP wave train had a tight relationship with the erupting filament, probably attributed to the unwinding motion of the erupting filament, or the leakage of the fast sausage wave train inside the filament body.

item.title: Comparison of Solar Wind Interaction with Mars and Earth: Energy Transfer
item.content:encoded:
<div> 关键词: 太阳风, 火星, 地球, 磁层重连接, 能量传输
总结: 太阳风对火星和地球的影响被用全球磁流体力学数值模拟进行了比较。火星缺乏类似地球的全球偶极磁场，而是在南半球高地附近有小尺度的地壳磁场。与地球磁层重连接不同的是，火星的磁堆积边界重连接发生在太阳天顶角约45°的位置（在南向IMF下，或在北向IMF下接近太阳尾部），导致了南北半球之间能量传输的不对称性。在南向（北向）IMF下，火星机械能的流出在太阳天顶角约45°的位置出现（太阳天顶角约30°和60°），伴随着“太阳风拾取”过程的流入。在不论IMF是北向还是南向的情况下，磁堆积边界的能量传输中，电磁能输入是机械能输入的两倍，这与地球在南向IMF下的磁层重连接相似，但在北向IMF下则相反。火星磁堆积边界的能量传输速率在北向IMF下略高于南向IMF，而地球磁层的能量传输速率在南向IMF下远高于北向IMF。 <div> Using a global magnetohydrodynamics numerical simulation, this work compares the interaction of the solar wind with Mars and Earth from the perspective of energy transfer under north–south interplanetary magnetic fields (IMFs). Mars lacks a global dipole magnetic field like Earth’s and instead has a small-scale crustal magnetic field near highlands in the southern hemisphere. Unlike Earth’s magnetopause reconnection (at the subsolar point or tail under a southward IMF, or behind the cusp under a northward IMF), the reconnection of the Martian magnetic pileup boundary (MPB) occurs near solar zenith angle (SZA) ≈ 45° (SZA ≈ 30° and 60°) for a southward (northward) IMF, resulting in asymmetric energy transfer between the northern and southern hemispheres. The Martian outflow of mechanical energy appears near SZA ≈ 45° (SZA ≈ 30° and 60°) under a southward (northward) IMF, accompanied by an inflow due to the process of “solar wind pickup.” For energy transfer across the MPB, whether the IMF is northward or southward, the input of electromagnetic energy is twice as large as the input of mechanical energy, which is similar to Earth’s magnetopause for a southward IMF, but opposite to it for a northward IMF. The energy transfer rate of the MPB is slightly higher in a northward IMF than in a southward one, whereas the energy transfer rate of Earth’s magnetopause is far higher in a southward IMF than in a northward one.

item.title: Energetic Electrons Observed Inside Magnetic Holes in the Magnetotail
item.content:encoded: <div> 关键词: 磁洞, 等离子体, 电子, 磁场, 不稳定性 总结: 磁洞是空间等离子体中的磁场凹陷，本文报道了两个大尺度磁洞MH1和MH2，首次在其中探测到高达100keV的高能电子。两个磁洞具有许多相似特征，如空间尺度、温度和总压力增加，以及其中的高能电子呈幂律分布。然而，它们也存在一些不同之处，MH1内部探测到了离子流涡和离子尺度的磁结构，并且高能电子的行为也不同于MH2。此外，MH1周围存在镜模不稳定性，而MH2周围则稳定，这表明两个磁洞可能处于不同的镜模不稳定性阶段。观测结果表明，在不同的阶段，电子可能在磁洞内得到显著加速。 <div> Magnetic holes, characterized as magnetic field depressions, have been widely observed in space plasma. Two large-scale magnetic holes, MH1 and MH2, were reported in this paper and the energetic electrons up to 100 keV were detected for the first time inside both holes. The two holes showed many similar features, comparable spatial scale, temperature and total pressure increase, and energetic electrons up to 100 keV with a power-law distribution inside them. On the other hand, distinct features were also found between these two holes. A potential ion flow vortex was detected inside the MH1 and an ion-scale magnetic structure was observed in its core region. The electron flux enhancements were associated with this ion-scale structure and the energetic electrons were nonadiabatic around the ion-scale structure inside MH1, while the energetic electrons were adiabatic inside the MH2. The mirror-mode instability was unstable around MH1 while stable around MH2, which suggested that the two holes might be in a different phase of the mirror-mode instability. The observations suggested that the electrons could be significantly accelerated inside magnetic holes in the different phases.
